extension.author: Alexander Krantz
extension.license: GNU General Public License version 2 or later
extension.description: Plugin that contains scout organisation library. The library is accessed through the $scoutOrg global which is an \Org\Controllers\ScoutGroupController. Documentation can be found 'somewhere'. Generate from the source code for now.

field.name: domain
field.description: The scoutnet server that has the api.
field.label: Scoutnet server

field.name: groupId
field.description: The scoutnet id of the scout group.
field.label: Scoutnet group id

field.name: memberListApiKey
field.description: The api key for the member list.
field.label: Member list key

field.name: mailingListsApiKey
field.description: The api key for the mailing lists.
field.label: Mailing lists key

field.name: scoutnetCacheLifeTime
field.description: The life time of the cached scoutnet data. A value of zero will disable cache.
field.label: Scoutnet Cache Life Time
